name: Race Code
description:
RACE CODE is a new generation racing game that will revive your old feelings. It will offer the opportunity to compete on maps at almost the exact scale in the real world. This is not an open world game, but there are roads almost the size of an open world game. You will find yourself on roads that are fun and exciting to drive around the world. In addition, day and night and changing weather conditions, specially designed shortcuts will add more pleasure. You will find many iconic cars from Asia, Europe and America in the game. As it is an early access game, commitments will be fulfilled over time. The game will be developed in line with the ideas and demands of you, the users, by creating a large community. Community requests will be surveyed, appropriate requests will be made.

The racing models currently available in the game is Sprint Race. Career mode, Free roaming, traffic, multiplayer modes and other features will be added to the system in the future, during this time the game will be played offline. With the achievements you make in career mode, you will be able to buy new roads and cars. The races you win or lose will change the status of your profile, so you can find tough opponents in multiplayer mode. You can race in singles race mode to practice and beat your own records.

Moreover, you can play the game with simulation or realistic physics engine that is easy to drive. You can enhance your driving experience by turning the driving assist features on or off.

We will give you the taste of old racing games!
